articles.title: NATO makes plans to boost its military presence in eastern Europe as Ukraine war grinds on - CBC News
articles.description: NATO defence ministers have asked military commanders to draw up plans for a significantly larger long-term deployment of western forces in eastern Europe, the secretary general of the alliance said Wednesday.

articles.title: Satellite images show massive Saharan dust storm engulfing western Europe - The Independent
articles.description: Storm Celia has carried dust from North Africa to Europe, affecting air quality in a number of countries
articles.content:
New satellite images have revealed the scale of the vast Saharan dust cloud blanketing western Europe.
